inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Light Hammer'); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Warhammer'); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Maul'); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Proficiency, Hammers
description: You are able to use hammers in combat.  This includes light hammers, warhammers, and the two handed maul.
